responsibilities: Developed an iPad application in a team of 2 engineers

Worked with XIB’s an developed an arc application.

Created model classes to handle backend and worked with ASIHTTP framework for networking and libXml parser for handling and parsing the incoming xml response
UIKit framework was used to implement visual designs from wireframes and documentation
Custom UI was implemented using Storyboarding

Planned goals using Agile methodology (SCRUM)

App stabilization by deducting bad memory access related crashes
Fixing other user interface related synchronization issues

Designed  and implemented custom userInterface
Used MVC, KVO, and Singleton architectures to streamline code

experiences.company: Cook IT Allergy Free by My Allergy Free Recipes, LLC

MessageUI was implemented to share recipes through text and email
Memory management system used was Manual Retain Release
Performed all tasks from UI design and implementation to writing code for various features

Implemented feature to save recipe favorites with Core Data framework
Integrated Facebook and Twitter APIs for sharing recipes to Twitter and Facebook
Conducted internal bug testing and fixed bugs when notified by QA
